TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供用于在设计时计算和编辑配置文件中的应用程序设置表达式的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing an application setting expression in a configuration file at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并提供了评估和在设计时与控件属性关联的应用程序设置引用实现。The class is derived from the class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating an application setting reference with a control property at design time. 例如，可以将控件属性的值绑定到应用程序设置表达式`AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`，该值指示控件属性值已设置使用`mySettingKeyName`中的值`appSettings`Web 配置文件的部分。For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the application setting expression `AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the `mySettingKeyName` value in the `appSettings` section of the Web configuration file. 可视化设计器宿主，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用类，以选择从应用程序设置`appSettings`配置部分中，然后计算设计时呈现所选的表达式。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to select an application setting from the `appSettings` configuration section, and then evaluates the selected expression for design-time rendering. 当你浏览到设计时属性网格中的控件的属性，可视化设计器显示一个对话框来设置控件属性提供的运行时间值的表达式。When you browse to the property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property. 可以选择基于的表达式前缀列表的表达式类型。You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes. 当选择**AppSettings**从列表中，可视化设计器宿主的表达式前缀将使用关联对象提供设计时编辑功能的`appSettings`表达式，并使用方法来计算和转换的表达式字符串基于应用程序设置表达式的语法。When you select the **AppSettings** expression prefix from the list, the visual designer host uses the associated object to provide design-time editing functionality of `appSettings` expressions and uses methods to evaluate and convert the expression string based on the syntax for an application setting expression. 可视化设计器宿主使用计算的表达式结果来指定控件在设计图面呈现的属性值。The visual designer host uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 属性对象返回的字符串`AppSettings`。The property for an object returns the string `AppSettings`. 类是与表达式前缀相关联`AppSettings`和实现。The class is associated with the expression prefix `AppSettings` and the implementation. 方法计算输入应用程序设置表达式字符串。The method evaluates an input application setting expression string. 方法将返回用于输入和编辑应用程序设置表达式的实现。The method returns the implementation that is used to enter and edit application setting expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定的属性对应用程序设置表达式中使用控制对象。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to an application setting expression using the object. 1. 在 Web 窗体项目中，添加`MyHyperLinkSetting`到``web.config 文件部分。In a Web Forms project, add `MyHyperLinkSetting` to the `` section of the web.config file. [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#5](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#5)] 2. 在 Web 窗体页中，添加控件。On a Web Forms page, add a control. 3. 有关`Hyperlink`控件，在属性中，单击**表达式**，然后单击省略号按钮 (**...**).For the `Hyperlink` control, in Properties, click **Expressions**, and then click the ellipsis button (**...**). ``**表达式**对话框随即出现。The ``**Expression** dialog box appears. 4. 下**可绑定属性**，单击**NavigateUrl**，在**表达式类型**列表中，单击**AppSettings**，然后在**表达式的属性**，请在**AppSetting**框中，键入**MyHyperLinkSetting**。Under **Bindable properties**, click **NavigateUrl**, in the **Expression type** list, click **AppSettings**, and then under **Expression properties**, in the **AppSetting** box, type **MyHyperLinkSetting**. 可视化设计器使用要分配的表达式`NavigateUrl`属性。The visual designer uses the to assign the expression for the `NavigateUrl` property. 以下的 aspx 源将显示使用应用程序设置表达式设置的属性值的示例。The following aspx source shows an example of a property value set using an application setting expression. [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#2)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类配置一起使用的基类属性设置为`AppSettings`。An instance of the class is configured by the base class together with the property set to `AppSettings`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
override this.EvaluateExpression : string * obj * Type * IServiceProvider -> obj

param.name: expression
param.span: 要计算的应用程序设置表达式字符串。

span.span: An application setting expression string to evaluate.

param.span: 不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 一个包含附加分析信息（用以计算 ）的对象。

span.span: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating .

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 计算应用程序设置表达式字符串，并为控件属性提供设计时值。

span.span: Evaluates an application setting expression string and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 如果表达式计算成功，则为由 引用的对象；否则为 。

span.span: The object referenced by , if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查找由指定的应用程序设置`expression`，然后返回应用程序设置的值。The method looks up the application setting that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the value of the application setting. 可视化设计器使用方法来计算应用程序设置表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供设计时值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate an application setting expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 可视化设计器调用具有表达式字符串和表达式的计算结果导致来指定控件在设计图面呈现的属性值的使用方法。The visual designer calls the method with the expression string, and uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 在运行时，页面分析程序使用并方法的相应实现来计算表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供的运行时间值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 为控件属性设置的表达式字符串，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.span: 不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 返回应用程序设置表达式的表达式编辑器表。

span.span: Returns an expression editor sheet for an application setting expression.

returns.span: 一个 实现，用于定义应用程序设置表达式的属性。

span.span: An implementation that defines the application setting expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个简单的编辑器表实现，使用单个输入的字符串的表达式。The method returns a simple editor sheet implementation, which uses a single input string to form the expression.
